TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Encoder extends System.Object

summary.span: 物件會封裝全域唯一識別項 (GUID)，這個識別項識別影像編碼器參數的分類。

span.span: An object encapsulates a globally unique identifier (GUID) that identifies the category of an image encoder parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將參數傳遞至影像編碼器時，參數封裝在物件。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 其中一個欄位的物件是指定之參數的分類的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的靜態欄位類別來擷取包含所需的類別目錄的參數。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 內建影像編碼器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]收到屬於數個類別的參數。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出所有類別，而每個類別相關聯的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

param.name: guid
param.span: 識別影像編碼器參數分類的全域唯一識別項。

span.span: A globally unique identifier that identifies an image encoder parameter category.

summary.span: 從指定的全域唯一識別項 (GUID) 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified globally unique identifier (GUID).

summary.span: GUID 會指定影像編碼器參數分類。

span.span: The GUID specifies an image encoder parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內建影像編碼器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]收到屬於數個類別的參數。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出所有類別，而每個類別相關聯的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

summary.span: 物件，是使用色彩深度參數分類的全域唯一識別項所初始化。

span.span: An object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the color depth parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將參數傳遞至影像編碼器時，參數封裝在物件。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 其中一個欄位的物件是指定之參數的分類的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的靜態欄位類別來擷取包含所需的類別目錄的參數。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 內建影像編碼器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]收到屬於數個類別的參數。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出所有類別，而每個類別相關聯的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下列範例會建立BMP 檔案中的物件。The following example creates a object from a BMP file. 程式碼會將影像儲存為 TIFF 檔案，為每像素 24 位元的色彩深度。The code saves the image as a TIFF file that has a color depth of 24 bits per pixel. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1/VB/form1.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoder2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoder2/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoder2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoder2/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoder2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoder2/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得 物件，這個物件是以品質參數分類的全域唯一識別碼初始化。

span.span: Gets an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the quality parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別指定影像的壓縮層級。The category specifies the level of compression for an image. 當用來建構，實用品質類別目錄值的範圍是從 0 到 100。When used to construct an , the range of useful values for the quality category is from 0 to 100. 低指定的數字，較高壓縮和映像的因此會降低品質。The lower the number specified, the higher the compression and therefore the lower the quality of the image. 零，以獲得最低品質的影像到 100 之間的最上層。Zero would give you the lowest quality image and 100 the highest. 當您將參數傳遞至影像編碼器時，參數封裝在物件。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 其中一個欄位的物件是指定之參數的分類的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的靜態欄位類別來擷取包含所需的類別目錄的參數。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 內建影像編碼器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]收到屬於數個類別的參數。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出所有類別，而每個類別相關聯的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下列範例會建立BMP 檔案中的物件。The following example creates a object from a BMP file. 程式碼會將點陣圖儲存至三個 JPEG 檔案，各有不同的品質等級。The code saves the bitmap to three JPEG files, each with a different quality level. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3/VB/form1.vb#3)]

related.span: 使用 Managed GDI+ 中的影像編碼器和解碼器

span.span: Using Image Encoders and Decoders in Managed GDI+

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Drawing.Imaging.Encoder RenderMethod
Public Shared ReadOnly RenderMethod As Encoder

summary.span: 表示 物件，此物件使用呈現參數分類的全域唯一識別項來進行初始化。

span.span: Represents an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the render method parameter category.

Public Shared ReadOnly SaveFlag As Encoder

summary.span: 表示 物件，此物件使用儲存旗標參數分類的全域唯一識別項來進行初始化。

span.span: Represents an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the save flag parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將參數傳遞至影像編碼器時，參數封裝在物件。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 其中一個欄位的物件是指定之參數的分類的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的靜態欄位類別來擷取包含所需的類別目錄的參數。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 內建影像編碼器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]收到屬於數個類別的參數。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出所有類別，而每個類別相關聯的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下列範例會建立三個物件： 從 BMP 檔案，一個從 JPEG 檔案，一個從 PNG 檔案。The following example creates three objects: one from a BMP file, one from a JPEG file, and one from a PNG file. 程式碼會將所有的三個映像儲存在單一的多個畫面格的 TIFF 檔案。The code saves all three images in a single, multiple-frame TIFF file. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4/VB/form1.vb#4)]

Public Shared ReadOnly Transformation As Encoder

summary.span: 表示 物件，此物件使用轉換參數分類的全域唯一識別項來進行初始化。

span.span: Represents an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the transformation parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將參數傳遞至影像編碼器時，參數封裝在物件。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 其中一個欄位的物件是指定之參數的分類的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的靜態欄位類別來擷取包含所需的類別目錄的參數。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 內建影像編碼器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]收到屬於數個類別的參數。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出所有類別，而每個類別相關聯的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下列範例會建立JPEG 檔案中的物件。The following example creates a object from a JPEG file. 程式碼會將影像旋轉 90 度，並將它儲存在個別的 JPEG 檔案。The code rotates the image 90 degrees and saves it in a separate JPEG file. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別指定影像的壓縮層級。The category specifies the level of compression for an image. 當用來建構，實用品質類別目錄值的範圍是從 0 到 100。When used to construct an , the range of useful values for the quality category is from 0 to 100. 低指定的數字，較高壓縮和映像的因此會降低品質。The lower the number specified, the higher the compression and therefore the lower the quality of the image. 零，以獲得最低品質的影像到 100 之間的最上層。Zero would give you the lowest quality image and 100 the highest. 當您將參數傳遞至影像編碼器時，參數封裝在物件。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 其中一個欄位的物件是指定之參數的分類的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的靜態欄位類別來擷取包含所需的類別目錄的參數。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 內建影像編碼器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]收到屬於數個類別的參數。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出所有類別，而每個類別相關聯的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797
